mapper.sql: fid, fmasterid, fnumber, ftaxrate, ftaxcategoryid, factivedate, fexpdate, fissystem, fenable, fstatus, fcreatorid, fcreatetime, fmodifierid, fmodifytime, fdisablerid, fdisabledate, forgid, fcreateorgid, fuserorg, fctrlstrategy, fcountry, fsourcedataid, fbitindex, fsourcebitindex, ftaxationsys, fvaluetype, ftaxunit, ftaxratetype, ftaxarea, fsrccreateorgid
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_bd_taxrate ORDER BY fid DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_bd_taxrate (fid, fmasterid, fnumber, ftaxrate, ftaxcategoryid, factivedate, fexpdate, fissystem, fenable, fstatus, fcreatorid, fcreatetime, fmodifierid, fmodifytime, fdisablerid, fdisabledate, forgid, fcreateorgid, fuserorg, fctrlstrategy, fcountry, fsourcedataid, fbitindex, fsourcebitindex, ftaxationsys, fvaluetype, ftaxunit, ftaxratetype, ftaxarea, fsrccreateorgid) VALUES (#{id}, #{masterid}, #{number}, #{taxrate}, #{taxcategoryid}, #{activedate}, #{expdate}, #{issystem}, #{enable}, #{status}, #{creatorid}, #{createtime}, #{modifierid}, #{modifytime}, #{disablerid}, #{disabledate}, #{orgid}, #{createorgid}, #{userorg}, #{ctrlstrategy}, #{country}, #{sourcedataid}, #{bitindex}, #{sourcebitindex}, #{taxationsys}, #{valuetype}, #{taxunit}, #{taxratetype}, #{taxarea}, #{srccreateorgid})

mapper.update: UPDATE t_bd_taxrate SET fmasterid = #{masterid}, fnumber = #{number}, ftaxrate = #{taxrate}, ftaxcategoryid = #{taxcategoryid}, factivedate = #{activedate}, fexpdate = #{expdate}, fissystem = #{issystem}, fenable = #{enable}, fstatus = #{status}, fcreatorid = #{creatorid}, fcreatetime = #{createtime}, fmodifierid = #{modifierid}, fmodifytime = #{modifytime}, fdisablerid = #{disablerid}, fdisabledate = #{disabledate}, forgid = #{orgid}, fcreateorgid = #{createorgid}, fuserorg = #{userorg}, fctrlstrategy = #{ctrlstrategy}, fcountry = #{country}, fsourcedataid = #{sourcedataid}, fbitindex = #{bitindex}, fsourcebitindex = #{sourcebitindex}, ftaxationsys = #{taxationsys}, fvaluetype = #{valuetype}, ftaxunit = #{taxunit}, ftaxratetype = #{taxratetype}, ftaxarea = #{taxarea}, fsrccreateorgid = #{srccreateorgid} WHERE fid = #{id}
